annotation_sentence: Of course. I’ve been working in digital marketing for about three years now, primarily focusing on social media strategies. I’ve managed campaigns for several brands, aiming to increase their online engagement.

annotation_sentence: Sure! Last year, I worked on a campaign for a local coffee shop. We increased their social media following by 50% within three months by creating engaging content and hosting online events.
